value.halfverse: attack those who are attacking me.
value.verse: Fight those who fight me, O LORD; *
Take up shield and armor *
value.halfverse: and rise up to help me.

value.verse: Draw the sword and bar the way against those who pursue me; *
value.halfverse: say to my soul, “I am your salvation.”

value.verse: Let those who seek after my life be shamed and humbled; *
value.halfverse: let those who plot my ruin fall back and be dismayed.
and let the angel of the LORD drive them away.
value.verse: Let them be like chaff before the wind, *

value.halfverse: and let the angel of the LORD pursue them.
value.verse: Let their way be dark and slippery, *

value.halfverse: without a cause they have dug a pit to take me alive.
value.verse: For they have secretly spread a net for me without a cause; *
Let ruin come upon them unawares; *
value.halfverse:
let them be caught in the net they hid;
 let them fall into the pit they dug.

value.verse: Then I will be joyful in the LORD; *
value.halfverse: I will glory in his victory.

You deliver the poor from those who are too strong for them,
 the poor and needy from those who rob them.”
value.verse: My very bones will say, “LORD, who is like you? *
Malicious witnesses rise up against me; *
value.halfverse: they charge me with matters I know nothing about.

value.verse: They pay me evil in exchange for good; *
value.halfverse: my soul is full of despair.
and humbled myself by fasting.
value.verse: But when they were sick I dressed in sack-cloth *

value.halfverse:
I behaved like one who mourns for his mother,
 bowed down and grieving.
value.verse:
I prayed with my whole heart,
as one would for a friend or a brother; *

value.halfverse: strangers whom I did not know tore me to pieces and would not stop.
value.verse:
But when I stumbled, they were glad and gathered together;
they gathered against me; *

value.halfverse: they gnashed at me with their teeth.
value.verse: They put me to the test and mocked me; *

value.halfverse:
rescue me from the roaring beasts,
 and my life from the young lions.
value.verse: O Lord, how long will you look on? *

value.halfverse: I will praise you in the mighty throng.
value.verse: I will give you thanks in the great congregation; *

value.halfverse: nor let those who hate me without a cause wink at each other.
value.verse: Do not let my treacherous foes rejoice over me, *
For they do not plan for peace, *
value.halfverse: but invent deceitful schemes against the quiet in the land.
“Aha! we saw it with our own eyes.”
value.verse: They opened their mouths at me and said, *

value.halfverse: O Lord, be not far from me.
value.verse: You saw it, O LORD; do not be silent; *
Awake, arise, to my cause! *
value.halfverse: to my defense, my God and my Lord!

value.verse:
Give me justice, O LORD my God,
according to your righteousness; *
value.halfverse: do not let them triumph over me.
Do not let them say, “We have swallowed him up.”
value.verse:
Do not let them say in their hearts,
“Aha! just what we want!” *

value.halfverse: let those who boast against me be clothed with dismay and shame.
value.verse: Let all who rejoice at my ruin be ashamed and disgraced; *
Let those who favor my cause sing out with joy and be glad; *
value.halfverse:
let them say always, “Great is the LORD,
 who desires the prosperity of his servant.”
and of your praise all the day long.
value.verse: And my tongue shall be talking of your righteousness *
